question: For the reaction <katex>$2N_{2}O_{5} \rightarrow 4NO_{2} + O_{2}$</katex>, initial concentration is 2.0 mol/L and after 300 min it is 1.4 mol/L. The rate of production of <katex>$NO_{2}$</katex> is
explanation: Rate of production of <katex>$NO_2 = +\frac{1}{4} \frac{\Delta [NO_2]}{\Delta t} = R$</katex>? No, Rate = <katex>$\frac{1}{4} \frac{d[NO_2]}{dt}$</katex>.
